title: Serious Question about new Swain
body:
How many steps ahead of us is he now?
[](https://imgur.com/IWJan93)

replies.body: Riot says five, swain says 10. who knows
twice as many since he isnt a criple
he is still a cripple. and riot said in his show off page "Stay 5 steps ahead of the opposition", but he has a voice line saying "I... am 10 steps ahead"
